title: Introducing: Cowboy
content:
Upbeat catchy indie-pop can’t be beaten at times, and that’s exactly what Cowboy are all about.

With the jangly guitar lines of Foals infused with the epic stadium-rock feel of Wild Beasts, the Leamington Spa four piece might not be breaking any boundaries with their two debut tracks Hacienda and In Time, but at the risk of sounding like a mainstream music journalist, they’re bloody good tunes. With a slot at Summer Sundae Festival on the horizon, as well as local gigs, it’s surely only a matter of time before they’re gracing the pages of other webzines. Check out both tracks below, and keep up with Cowboy via their Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
